SEARCH

Class Circle

java.lang.Object
Circle
public class Circle extends Object
A circle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Circle()
    Create a new circle at default position with default color.
    Circle(int x, int y, int diameter, String color, boolean visible)
    Create a new circle with a specified position and color.

  • Method Details

    • makeVisible

      public void makeVisible()
      Make this circle visible. If it was already visible, do nothing.

    • makeInvisible

      public void makeInvisible()
      Make this circle invisible. If it was already invisible, do nothing.

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Determine if the circle should be showing on the canvas
      Returns:
      true if the shape is not hidden

      Get the circle's current diameter

      public void moveRight()
      Move the circle a few pixels to the right.

      public void moveLeft()
      Move the circle a few pixels to the left.

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp()
      Move the circle a few pixels up.

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown()
      Move the circle a few pixels down.

    • moveHorizontal

      public void moveHorizontal(int distance)
      Move the circle horizontally by 'distance' pixels.
      Parameters:
      distance - the distance to move the circle along the x axis, positive to the right

    • moveVertical

      public void moveVertical(int distance)
      Move the circle vertically by 'distance' pixels.
      Parameters:
      distance - the distance to move the circle along the y axis, positive down

    • changeSize

      public void changeSize(int newDiameter)
      Change the size to the new size (in pixels). Size must be >= 0.
      Parameters:
      newDiameter - the diameter of the circle

    • changeColor

      public void changeColor(String newColor)
      Change the color. Valid colors are "red", "yellow", "blue", "green", "magenta", "cyan", "brown", "white", and "black", or rgb hex strings "#rrggbb" where rr, gg, bb are 2-hexit values for red, green, and blue levels.
      Parameters:
      newColor - a lower case string naming the color to change to

    • contains

      public boolean contains(int x, int y)
      Determine if a point is inside the circle
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the point
      y - the y-coordinate of the point
      Returns:
      true if the point is inside the circle
